songs.title: Mrs. Right
songs.album: A Collection of Rare and Unreleased Recordings
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You feeling brave
He just glanced your way
You shouldn't stay
But it's really not that late
So you say
As you flip your hair and bat your eyes
His way
Honey your mistaken cause

[Chorus]
He's my baby
Maybe you might catch his eye
But I ain't worried
Cause girl he comes home to me at night
You're not the first and probably not the last
Whose gunna try
But you'll find that you're all wrong
Meet Mrs. Right

[Verse 2]
I don't blame you
He's really something else
I'd want him to
Oh wait he's mine already
How rude of me to rub it in
But girl I'm through
Watching
And I'm warning you because

[Chorus]

[Verse 3]
Just when the coast is clear
You move near
Inching closer
Closer to him and with that
Angel smile
You suddenly see my
One little problem
Im not the sheriff kind

[Outro]
Cause he's my baby
And maybe you might catch his eye
But I ain't worried
Cause girl he comes home to me at night
You're not the first and probably not the last
That's gunna try
But you'll find that you're all wrong
I know that you're all wrong
You know that you're all wrong
Meet Mrs. Right
